title: Clear day in the city, slow-speed driving with frequent braking.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly in a busy city street with frequent braking.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (glareDay). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 5.0 m/s). There are 13 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The video shows the ego vehicle driving slowly on a busy city street with frequent braking. The road is wet, and there are many other vehicles and pedestrians around. The traffic lights are mostly red, and there are several parked cars on the side of the road. The weather is clear, and the sky is blue.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to ensure safety and avoid collisions with other vehicles and pedestrians. The frequent braking events indicate that the driver is being cautious and paying close attention to the road. The wet road surface may also be a contributing factor to the slower driving speed. The presence of many other vehicles and pedestrians suggests that this is a busy area of the city, and the driver needs to be extra vigilant to avoid accidents.
